ygData.subject: Scuba
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail! First sorry missed the Gnomestock... had an early start next day and that was 2 am here in England sigh... will make the next even if I have to wander
ygData.messageBody:
Hail!

First sorry missed the Gnomestock... had an early start next day and that was
2 am here in England sigh... will make the next even if I have to wander
round like an undead the next day ;-).

Haven't anything on the scyba gear yet EXCEPT that it is our path to RICHES
if it has a decent duration... maybe a tank level indicator.

These are the reasons,,,, Fishbone earring is an 8 hour spawn and drops 1 in
4 spawns.... underwater breathing is needed for some quests Shaman for one
and not I think in just kedge keep but underwater in Perma. Have a 39 shaman
friend who traded for an earring, couldn't get it personally a MAJOR favtion
hit against Barbarians... and which race has most shamen?

He has used the earring and is talking obscene amounts of trade for it. It
has really become a need to have item with new quests. I'm talking thousands
here. Work it out... 8 hour spwan 1 in 4 drop thats 1 earring every 24 hours
IF you dont mind the BAD hit. The place was never camped whenever I passed it
before, near Surefell Glade, bet it is now.

Time for me to get going on my tinkering skill have neglected it waiting for
it to work and avoid the frustrations but one of the reasons I chose gnomes
in the first place, makes us stand apart from the rest of the reaces.

Stay Safe..... Fley Key Gnomish Mage of 22nd circle Solusek Ro
